languages.text: Владайм Токара, бывший преступный барон и контрабандист, на удивление неплохо справлялся с работой уборщика. Карабкаясь по иерархической лестнице, он со временем смог добиться прощения и статуса высокопоставленного управителя на Даргонусе. Деловая хватка, жесткость и отсутствие брезгливости приносили процветание его предприятиям, но не ему самому — до последних дней Токара занимал скромные покои и избегал роскоши, словно боялся, что его упрекнут в воровстве и, как он выражался, "отправят на круг".

Vladaym Tocara, former crime lord and smuggler, managed surprisingly well in the role of janitor. Climbing the hierarchical ladder, he eventually obtained a pardon and became an administrator of high standing on Dargonus. His business acumen, shrewdness, and willingness to get his hands dirty brought success to his operations, but he was unable to enjoy the fruits of his labour — until the end of his days, he resided in modest quarters and avoided any luxury, afraid of being accused of corruption and, in his own words, "thrown for a loop."
languages.original_text: Владайм Токара, бывший преступный барон и контрабандист, на удивление неплохо справлялся с работой уборщика. Карабкаясь по иерархической лестнице, он со временем смог добиться прощения и статуса высокопоставленного управителя на Даргонусе. Деловая хватка, жесткость и отсутствие брезгливости приносили процветание его предприятиям, но не ему самому — до последних дней Токара занимал скромные покои и избегал роскоши, словно боялся, что его упрекнут в воровстве и, как он выражался, "отправят на круг".

traits.locale_text: Vladaym Tocara, former crime lord and smuggler, managed surprisingly well in the role of a janitor. Climbing the hierarchical ladder, after some time, he successfully obtained a pardon and a status of high-standing administrator on Dargonus. His business acumen, sternness and lack of squeamishness brought success to his operations, but not to him. Until the end of his days he resided in modest quarters and avoided any luxury, as if he was afraid of being accused of corruption, and, in his own words, "being thrown for a loop".

Until the end of his days he resided in modest quarters and avoided any luxury, as if he was afraid of being accused of corruption, and, in his own words, "being thrown for a loop".

languages.text: 前犯罪头目兼走私犯弗拉迪姆·托卡拉担任了清洁工的角色，工作表现好得出奇。最终，他爬上了权力的阶梯，获得了赦免，成为了达戈努斯地位高贵的管理者。他的商业头脑、精于算计的手段，以及不介意弄脏手的作风，让他的事业大获成功，但他却无法享受自己的劳动成果。直到生命结束的那一刻，他都始终居住在简朴的住宅中，极力避免任何奢侈作风，生怕被人指控犯下腐败罪行，最终落得被丢出气闸的下场。
languages.original_text: Vladaym Tocara, former crime lord and smuggler, managed surprisingly well in the role of janitor. Climbing the hierarchical ladder, he eventually obtained a pardon and became an administrator of high standing on Dargonus. His business acumen, shrewdness, and willingness to get his hands dirty brought success to his operations, but he was unable to enjoy the fruits of his labour — until the end of his days, he resided in modest quarters and avoided any luxury, afraid of being accused of corruption and, in his own words, "thrown for a loop."

traits.locale_text: 前犯罪头目兼走私犯弗拉迪姆·托卡拉担任了清洁工的角色，工作表现好得出奇。最终，他爬上了权力的阶梯，获得了赦免，成为了达戈努斯地位高贵的管理者。他的商业头脑、精于算计的手段，以及不介意弄脏手的作风，让他的事业大获成功，但他却无法享受自己的劳动成果。直到生命结束的那一刻，他都始终居住在简朴的住宅中，极力避免任何奢侈作风，生怕被人指控犯下腐败罪行，最终落得被丢出气闸的下场。

languages.text: Vladaym Tocara, ehemaliger Verbrecherboss und Schmuggler, kam in der Rolle als Hausmeister erstaunlich gut zurecht. Er arbeitete sich die hierarchische Leiter hoch und wurde schließlich begnadigt und wurde zu einem angesehenen Verwaltungsmitarbeiter auf Dargonus. Sein Geschäftssinn, seine Gerissenheit und seine Bereitschaft, sich die Hände schmutzig zu machen, brachten ihm Erfolg, doch er konnte die Früchte seiner Arbeit nicht genießen. Bis zum Ende seiner Tage wohnte er in bescheidenen Quartieren und mied jeden Luxus. Er hatte Angst, man könne ihn der Verderbnis bezichtigen und ihn, in seinen eigenen Worten, "auf Spazierflug schicken".
languages.original_text: Vladaym Tocara, former crime lord and smuggler, managed surprisingly well in the role of janitor. Climbing the hierarchical ladder, he eventually obtained a pardon and became an administrator of high standing on Dargonus. His business acumen, shrewdness, and willingness to get his hands dirty brought success to his operations, but he was unable to enjoy the fruits of his labour — until the end of his days, he resided in modest quarters and avoided any luxury, afraid of being accused of corruption and, in his own words, "thrown for a loop."

traits.locale_text: Vladaym Tocara, ehemaliger Verbrecherboss und Schmuggler, kam in der Rolle als Hausmeister erstaunlich gut zurecht. Er arbeitete sich die hierarchische Leiter hoch und wurde schließlich begnadigt und wurde zu einem angesehenen Verwaltungsmitarbeiter auf Dargonus. Sein Geschäftssinn, seine Gerissenheit und seine Bereitschaft, sich die Hände schmutzig zu machen, brachten ihm Erfolg, doch er konnte die Früchte seiner Arbeit nicht genießen. Bis zum Ende seiner Tage wohnte er in bescheidenen Quartieren und mied jeden Luxus. Er hatte Angst, man könne ihn der Verderbnis bezichtigen und ihn, in seinen eigenen Worten, "auf Spazierflug schicken".

languages.text: Vladaym Tocara, ancien baron du crime et contrebandier, s'adapta étonnamment bien à son nouveau poste de nettoyeur. Son travail diligent lui permit de gravir les échelons de la hiérarchie jusqu'à ce qu'il soit enfin gracié, après quoi il devint un administrateur très réputé sur Dargonus. Perspicace, doué d'un sens aigu des affaires et prêt à se salir les mains, il menait à bien la plupart de ses opérations, mais ne put profiter des fruits de son labeur. Jusqu'à la fin de ses jours, il vécut dans de modestes appartements et évita toute forme de luxe, de peur de se trouver accusé de corruption et, selon ses propres mots, « d'être envoyé au rebut ».
languages.original_text: Vladaym Tocara, former crime lord and smuggler, managed surprisingly well in the role of janitor. Climbing the hierarchical ladder, he eventually obtained a pardon and became an administrator of high standing on Dargonus. His business acumen, shrewdness, and willingness to get his hands dirty brought success to his operations, but he was unable to enjoy the fruits of his labour — until the end of his days, he resided in modest quarters and avoided any luxury, afraid of being accused of corruption and, in his own words, "thrown for a loop."

traits.locale_text: Vladaym Tocara, ancien baron du crime et contrebandier, s’adapta étonnamment bien à son nouveau poste de nettoyeur. Son travail diligent lui permit de gravir les échelons de la hiérarchie jusqu’à ce qu'il soit enfin gracié, après quoi il devint un administrateur très réputé sur Dargonus. Perspicace, doué d’un sens aigu des affaires et prêt à se salir les mains, il menait à bien la plupart de ses opérations, mais ne put profiter des fruits de son labeur. Jusqu'à la fin de ses jours, il vécut dans de modestes appartements et évita toute forme de luxe, de peur de se trouver accusé de corruption et, selon ses propres mots, « d'être envoyé au rebut ».

languages.text: Vladaym Tocara, antiguo contrabandista y señor del crimen, se desenvolvió sorprendentemente bien como conserje. Ascendió por la jerarquía hasta llegar a obtener un perdón y convertirse en un administrador de alto rango en Dargonus. Sus conocimientos comerciales, su astucia y su predisposición a mancharse las manos le llevaron al éxito, pero fue incapaz de disfrutar del fruto de su trabajo: hasta el fin de sus días, vivió en una residencia modesta y evitó toda clase de lujo, temeroso de ser acusado de corrupción y, en sus propias palabras, «tener que repetirlo todo».
languages.original_text: Vladaym Tocara, former crime lord and smuggler, managed surprisingly well in the role of janitor. Climbing the hierarchical ladder, he eventually obtained a pardon and became an administrator of high standing on Dargonus. His business acumen, shrewdness, and willingness to get his hands dirty brought success to his operations, but he was unable to enjoy the fruits of his labour — until the end of his days, he resided in modest quarters and avoided any luxury, afraid of being accused of corruption and, in his own words, "thrown for a loop."

traits.locale_text: Vladaym Tocara, antiguo contrabandista y señor del crimen, se desenvolvió sorprendentemente bien como conserje. Ascendió por la jerarquía hasta llegar a obtener un perdón y convertirse en un administrador de alto rango en Dargonus. Sus conocimientos comerciales, su astucia y su predisposición a mancharse las manos le llevaron al éxito, pero fue incapaz de disfrutar del fruto de su trabajo: hasta el fin de sus días, vivió en una residencia modesta y evitó toda clase de lujo, temeroso de ser acusado de corrupción y, en sus propias palabras, «tener que repetirlo todo».

languages.text: ヴラダイム・トカラは元犯罪王で密輸業者だったが、用務員という役割で驚くほどうまくやった。出世の階段を上り、やがて恩赦を得てダルゴナスの高位な行政官になった。彼の商才、抜け目のなさ、自分の手を汚すことを厭わない姿勢は、彼の事業に成功をもたらしたが、彼はその労働の成果を享受することはできなかった。最期を迎えるまで、彼は汚職の嫌疑をかけられることを恐れ、彼自身の言葉を借りれば 「ドブに捨てられる」ことを恐れて、質素な宿舎に住み、贅沢をすることを避けた。
languages.original_text: Vladaym Tocara, former crime lord and smuggler, managed surprisingly well in the role of janitor. Climbing the hierarchical ladder, he eventually obtained a pardon and became an administrator of high standing on Dargonus. His business acumen, shrewdness, and willingness to get his hands dirty brought success to his operations, but he was unable to enjoy the fruits of his labour — until the end of his days, he resided in modest quarters and avoided any luxury, afraid of being accused of corruption and, in his own words, "thrown for a loop."

traits.locale_text: ヴラダイム・トカラは元犯罪王で密輸業者だったが、用務員という役割で驚くほどうまくやった。出世の階段を上り、やがて恩赦を得てダルゴナスの高位な行政官になった。彼の商才、抜け目のなさ、自分の手を汚すことを厭わない姿勢は、彼の事業に成功をもたらしたが、彼はその労働の成果を享受することはできなかった。最期を迎えるまで、彼は汚職の嫌疑をかけられることを恐れ、彼自身の言葉を借りれば 「ドブに捨てられる」ことを恐れて、質素な宿舎に住み、贅沢をすることを避けた。

languages.text: Eski suç baronu ve kaçakçı Vladaym Tocara, temizlikçilik görevinde şaşırtıcı derecede başarılı oldu. Hiyerarşi basamaklarını tırmanarak ilerleyen dönemlerde af elde etti ve Dargonus'ta yüksek rütbeli bir yönetici oldu. İş zekâsı, açıkgözlülüğü ve ellerini kirletmekten çekinmemesi, çabalarının başarıyla sonuçlanmasına yol açtı ancak çalışmalarının meyvelerini toplaması mümkün olmadı. Yozlaşmışlıkla suçlanmaktan korktuğu ve kendi deyimiyle "durduk yere tepetaklak olmamak" için hayatının sonuna kadar mütevazı bir evde yaşadı ve lüksten kaçındı.
languages.original_text: Vladaym Tocara, former crime lord and smuggler, managed surprisingly well in the role of janitor. Climbing the hierarchical ladder, he eventually obtained a pardon and became an administrator of high standing on Dargonus. His business acumen, shrewdness, and willingness to get his hands dirty brought success to his operations, but he was unable to enjoy the fruits of his labour — until the end of his days, he resided in modest quarters and avoided any luxury, afraid of being accused of corruption and, in his own words, "thrown for a loop."

İş zekâsı, açıkgözlülüğü ve ellerini kirletmekten çekinmemesi, çabalarının başarıyla sonuçlanmasına yol açtı ancak çalışmalarının meyvelerini toplaması mümkün olmadı. Yozlaşmışlıkla suçlanmaktan korktuğu ve kendi deyimiyle "durduk yere tepetaklak olmamak" için hayatının sonuna kadar mütevazı bir evde yaşadı ve lüksten kaçındı.
